alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 8:20PM CDT until June 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... San Jacinto County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Liberty County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Polk County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Walker County in southeastern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 819 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chester to near Coldspring to 7 miles north of Montgomery, moving southeast at 30 mph. This line of storms has a history of producing strong damaging winds in the Huntsville area. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conroe, Cleveland, Willis, Livingston, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Shepherd, Panorama Village, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Magnolia, Woodbranch, Cut And Shoot, New Waverly, Coldspring, Hardin, Montgomery, Plum Grove and Goodrich. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Liberty; Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Walker
